description:
Kazuya, a mild-mannered high school sophomore coming to the end of a very average summer break, receives a digital single lens reflex camera as a gift. His nerdy fascination with its design soon turns to wonder when he realizes this little gadget could really give his social life a shot in the arm!

(Source: TBS)

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Photography
tags.description: Centers around the use of cameras to capture photos.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Incest
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations between characters who are related by blood.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

<b>Non-anime roles:<b>
Kuki Shinobu - Genshin Impact
[Chidori Michiru](https://bluearchive.wiki/wiki/Michiru) - Blue Archive
[Akikawa Yayoi](https://umamusume.jp/character/akikawayayoi) - Uma Musume: Pretty Derby (VG)

[Profile (Aoni)](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/ito-kanae.html) | [Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/itokanae/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kanae_1126_ito) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/itokanae_info) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/ito-kanae/)

After graduating from high school, Kanae enrolled at the Amusement Media Academy, a vocational school for voice actors and artists, and graduated in 2007. Prior to graduating she was a member of two voice acting groups called Koetchi (こえっち) and Rirachitchi (りらちっち) before both groups disbanded in December 2005 and January 28, 2007 respectively.

Her first major role came in 2007 when she played the lead heroine, Amu Hinamori, from the anime Shugo Chara!. The show became a hit and Kanae was praised by critics. Since then, she has voiced Amu in other Shugo Chara! franchises including radio serials, drama CDs and video games.  

She and fellow voice actress Aki Toyosaki are good friends who worked together on several anime including Shugo Chara!, To Love-Ru, The World God Only Knows, Hanasaku Iroha and Toaru Kagaku no Railgun (both also hosted the Toaru Kagaku no Railgun web radio show, Radio no Railgun). 

She was also nominated for "Best Rookie Voice Actress," at the 4th Seiyuu Awards.  

In January 1st, 2024, she announced on both her blog and Twitter account that she got married to a man from outside the entertainment industry.

Non-Anime Roles:

Campanella - The Legend of Heroes Series (VG)

[Website](http://www.pyxie-llc.com/minakubota/) | [Blog](http://minakubota.blog8.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/minakubota)

[Profile (Sigma Seven)](https://www.sigma7.co.jp/prof/w_58.html) | [Official Blog](https://ameblo.jp/asu-kame/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/asu_kame) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asuka_%C5%8Cgame) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%A4%A7%E4%BA%80%E3%81%82%E3%81%99%E3%81%8B)

She is married to fellow seiyuu [Nobuhiko Okamoto](https://anilist.co/staff/95270).

__Height:__ 157 cm (5'2")

[Profile](http://www.pro-baobab.jp/ladies/kanemoto_h/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/kanemoto-hisako)

Hisako Kanemoto was raised in Okayama Prefecture and attended Kamogata High School. Upon graduation, she enrolled in the voice acting course at the Vocational School of Art College Kobe. After completing her education in 2008, she moved to Tokyo and joined the training office associated with Production Baobab agency.

Early in her career, Kanemoto used the pseudonym _Juri Aikawa_. She made her anime debut in [Sora no Manimani](https://anilist.co/anime/6098) in 2009 under this name. After landing the lead role in [So Ra No Wo](https://anilist.co/anime/6802) To the following year, Kanemoto announced that she would be using her real name in her works moving forward. She was also cast as the title character in [Shinryaku! Ika Musume](https://anilist.co/anime/8557) later that year.

After a breakthrough 2010, Kanemoto was named Best New Actress at the 5th Seiyuu Awards. She has also voiced a number of mascot characters from Okayama Prefecture because of her origin.

Kanemoto made her debut as a solo musical artist in 2014 under Victor Entertainment with the album Fantastic Voyage.

On May 26, 2018 she announced on her official blog that she will take hiatus from professional activities for studying abroad. Her agency Production BAOBAB confirmed her return to work in March 2019.

__Non-anime roles:__

[Agency Profile](https://www.jvcmusic.co.jp/-/Profile/A021219.html) | [Website](http://pyxie-llc.com/hayatokaori/)

Kaori Hayato is a Japanese singer. 

Her father is Japanese, and her mother is Brazilian. Her first mainstream album, pluma, was released in 2008, followed by Lindas one year later, both albums released by Victor Entertainment. She sings in Japanese, Portuguese, English, and French. Currently lives in Kirishima, Kagoshima Prefecture.
In March 2010, she graduated from Tokyo Animation College.
